title: CMD Snake
description: A small snake game made with c#. It features 3 difficulty modes and snake money instead of snake food.

title: Wireship
description: A 2D space shooter made with JavaScript, using vectors to dynamically draw objects on HTML canvas and create procedural asteroid shapes.

title: NES Pong
description: A simple pong game made with pure NES 6502 assembly... It features a two player gameplay and a simple audio engine which plays a tune I made and exported with FamiTracker.

title: illyaBot (Discord)
description: A very very (very) simple Discord bot made using the Discord bot API for JavaScript and deployed on Heroku.

title: CMD Chat with SFML
description: A small chat application made using the SFML socket functionallity. The same application can be set as server or client and it features... no user interface...
